mapper.select:
select di.diagnosis_number, di.doctor_number, di.pharmacy_number, di.diagnosis_type, di.diagnosis_time, di.diagnosis_wait_number, di.diagnosis_content, di.diagnosis_image_name, di.diagnosis_status, di.is_diagnosis_upload, di.is_prescription_upload, di.diagnosis_file_name, di.prescription_file_name, di.diagnosis_money, di.prescription_money, di.is_delivery, di.billing_key, di.doctor_opinion, di.pharmacy_name, di.pharmacy_address, di.pharmacy_phone, di.user_address, di.create_date, di.update_date,
doc.doctor_email, doc.doctor_phone, doc.doctor_name, doc.hospital_name, doc.hospital_telephone, doc.hospital_business_number, doc.doctor_diagnosis_type, doc.working_time, doc.lunch_time, doc.holiday, doc.zip_code, doc.street_address, doc.detail_address, doc.hospital_fax, doc.hospital_url, doc.create_date, doc.update_date,
us.user_number, us.user_email, us.user_name, us.user_registration_number, us.user_phone, us.billing_key, us.create_date, us.update_date
from `diagnosis` di join `doctor` doc on di.doctor_number = doc.doctor_number join `user` us on di.user_number = us.user_number where di.pharmacy_number = 1 order by di.create_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into `pharmacy`(pharmacy_email, pharmacy_password, pharmacy_mobile, pharmacy_business, pharmacy_name, pharmacy_phone, zip_code, street_address, detail_address) values (#{pharmacy_email}, #{pharmacy_password}, #{pharmacy_mobile}, #{pharmacy_business}, #{pharmacy_name}, #{pharmacy_phone}, #{zip_code}, #{street_address}, #{detail_address})
